title: ‘To me, Jimmy Savile was a good man’
text:
Tom Jones says paedophile Jimmy Savile ‘was a good man’ Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Tom Jones says paedophile Jimmy Savile ‘was a good man’ Network Writers News Corp Australia Network 
SIR Tom Jones has revealed he was “shocked” at discovering the late British entertainer Jimmy Savile was a paedophile, saying: “To me, he was a good man” 
The 75-year-old admitted that Savile “always liked teenage girls” and “looked a bit creepy,” but never suspected his disgraceful history of abuse. 
“He always liked teenage girls, as long as they were over 16, which of course is legal. And you would always see him around with young girls,” Jones told BBC Radio. 
“When you see someone like that, you would never think he was a paedophile because of the way he handled himself. 
“You always think of paedophiles as being like creepy people — well maybe to some people he did look a bit creepy — but he was a bit of a Jack The Lad with young girls.” British entertainer ... Tom Jones said Jimmy Savile helped his career. Picture: AP Photo/Lewis Whyld/PA Wire 
Savile was a beloved TV and radio personality who spent much of his career working with children and charities. Following his death in 2011, hundreds of people stepped forward claiming he had sexually abused them . The reported allegations cover a 50-year period. Other Stories
